name: expando (GGJ)
description:
Pando is known as the biggest live organisms in the world. Has lived for more than 80,000 years thanks to its thousands of roofs, which are able to grow a new clone of its original member. Pando is a unique type of tree in the world and he's in danger to disappear.

In expando you play the role of Pando's roofs to administrate resources and keep Pando far from some disasters on living will. In this short level, conquer the island and save Pando!

Credits
